East in 2022.

did I spend it Sunday with you in Maribor?

22 based on your opinion, it's going to be energy tourism technology and already on the 4th place it's going to be agriculture which was for us when we saw the results.

Communication, but here we found again financial institutions, which is interesting because before your opinion was that there is no, you know there's no real green light in 2022 in this area, but still I would like to work here.

However, as it looks to me, they're not cool enough and we don't want to work there.
So as you can see you have a huge gap in the percentages on the other side you would like to work in some area, but you see that the industry is going down and that there is no real potential.

For example, financial institutions media an as well government, which was again a surprise that so many of you told us that you would like to work in the government but not in this conditions, because the industry is not healthy enough that I would like to work there.
In which functions would you like to work?
And this is the answer.
Again, going nicely together with the industries the majority of you told that I would like to work in R&D.
The second area was the program management and then already followed by management.
When we saw the result, I said that's interesting.

This generation is really interested in project management, so it means that they would like to work on a cross functional matter so they like to have a job which is not static, which has a contact with many different functions.
So real project management function while sales for example, which used to be very on the top, dropped dramatically.
Another thing which is also surprises.
Horse human resources going from year to year up.
As you can see there as well, so we see that some things are going nicely together, and this is actually also good.
Let's say moment.
If I stop for awhile because you told us that you would like to work in industry like technology, communication and so on.

On the other side, the functions like R&D project management are all creating additional value added value, which means that you really would like to work in knowledge based areas, which I think is good and we should really use it together.
Which are the countries with?
The highest potential.
I guess not a big surprise.
Russia, Turkey and Poland followed by Czech Republic, Slovenia, Hungary, Ukraine, Croatia and other countries.
An in your eye.
Yes, these are the countries in Eastern Europe which doesn't have really a good position.
These are Kosovo, Albania, Moldova, Boston Herzegovina, Bella, Ross and the other countries.

Let's say the youth, and it was if you could change anything in Eastern Europe, what would you do?
We got a lot of different answers, but we managed to cluster them in eight areas.
The first was we would like to have lower government involvement in economy, better tax system and less corruption.
The second one was let's increase cooperation among Eastern European countries and let's increase as well the global cooperation.
I saw many comments which went in the direction Eastern Europe is sometimes hiding.
We don't have really a good Corporation globally.
We are never really somewhere there.
When something is happening.
The third one was let's increase transparency in communication.
And let's build a global image.
Let's build a good global image and a good brand.
You know, and I also know it, sometimes alone.
You know that sometimes, unfortunately, already when you come from Eastern Europe, you need to run faster and you need to run better in order to show.
Yes.
I can also do it.
It doesn't matter from where I coming and many of you also commented in the questionnaire on that way.
The 4th one was let's increase in investment in youth.
There was also some comments like Let's Invest invest in those areas where we will get the job.
It should be really done on a country level.
It doesn't make sense that we can go on every University, but on the end of the day we cannot get a job in that area and then we have young people sitting in hope at home and waiting.
What will happen to them.
So it should be really focused investments into education where we will later be able to work.
Increased support of entrepreneurship and startups.

As I already said before, many of you or so on the weekend when we met you and when we were discussing, it's going in your mind that this is something that is interesting for you, but you don't see still enough support from the government site in order to start your own business, your own dreams.
Improve the mentality, overall improved the mentality and overall attitude towards business and entrepreneurship.

Many of you commented that there is so much negative area and let's say to so much negative things going around that many times you even are not sure if you want to start your own business and if you want to start to work in any kind of environment.
Another one was encouraged.
Development of innovation specially in the green area and the last one was spreading of latest technological innovation.
So to end our presentation, I think that today we are here surrounded with young brilliant minds.

And I also think surrounded with people who are in power and therefore I really don't know what is stopping us like you little said nothing shit should stop us and I really hope that we will be encouraged to change the future.
Thank you.

And then actually we started to explore further.
So obviously this is the generation which is, let's say, very open minded and which sees the startups as an area where they would like to work in Eastern Europe of course.
But we need to help them to start the dreams.
Then we came to the question about the government support to the industries.
So we ask, what do you think in terms of all industries that you can see?
Do the government needs to invest further?
Do you see an opportunity for that?
Or you think everything is already fine like it is today and the red color is showing you?
Yes, there needs to be additional support from the government, specially in energy tourism, technology and communication.
We have also asked what is going to be the flagship industry in 2000.
22 based on your opinion, it's going to be energy tourism technology and already on the 4th place it's going to be agriculture which was for us when we saw the results.
Quite quite a surprise again.
However, on the other side, you are naming that, for example, financial institutions and as well medias are going to slowly die in 2022 and as well retail, automotive and other industries.
We have asked you where would you like to work in which of those industries.
Of course, in those which you see as the flagship industries, which is good as John would need to explain again.
So it's technology.
And it's also tourism as well.

Communication, but here we found again financial institutions, which is interesting because before your opinion was that there is no, you know there's no real green light in 2022 in this area, but still I would like to work here.
So this is, let's say the summary.
On one side we have the lack of interest to work, so the questioner showed us that energy tourism and agriculture are in the switch which are going to be developed further in 2022.
However, as it looks to me, they're not cool enough and we don't want to work there.
So as you can see you have a huge gap in the percentages on the other side you would like to work in some area, but you see that the industry is going down and that there is no real potential.

For example, financial institutions media an as well government, which was again a surprise that so many of you told us that you would like to work in the government but not in this conditions, because the industry is not healthy enough that I would like to work there.
In which functions would you like to work?
And this is the answer.
Again, going nicely together with the industries the majority of you told that I would like to work in R&D.
The second area was the program management and then already followed by management.
When we saw the result, I said that's interesting.

This generation is really interested in project management, so it means that they would like to work on a cross functional matter so they like to have a job which is not static, which has a contact with many different functions.
So real project management function while sales for example, which used to be very on the top, dropped dramatically.
Another thing which is also surprises.
Horse human resources going from year to year up.

Let's say moment.

On the other side, the functions like R&D project management are all creating additional value added value, which means that you really would like to work in knowledge based areas, which I think is good and we should really use it together.
Which are the countries with?
The highest potential.

And we also, of course ask the questions that we are always asking.
Let's say the youth, and it was if you could change anything in Eastern Europe, what would you do?
We got a lot of different answers, but we managed to cluster them in eight areas.
The first was we would like to have lower government involvement in economy, better tax system and less corruption.
The second one was let's increase cooperation among Eastern European countries and let's increase as well the global cooperation.
I saw many comments which went in the direction Eastern Europe is sometimes hiding.
We don't have really a good Corporation globally.
We are never really somewhere there.
When something is happening.
The third one was let's increase transparency in communication.
And let's build a global image.
Let's build a good global image and a good brand.
You know, and I also know it, sometimes alone.
You know that sometimes, unfortunately, already when you come from Eastern Europe, you need to run faster and you need to run better in order to show.
Yes.
I can also do it.
It doesn't matter from where I coming and many of you also commented in the questionnaire on that way.
The 4th one was let's increase in investment in youth.
There was also some comments like Let's Invest invest in those areas where we will get the job.
It should be really done on a country level.
It doesn't make sense that we can go on every University, but on the end of the day we cannot get a job in that area and then we have young people sitting in hope at home and waiting.
What will happen to them.
So it should be really focused investments into education where we will later be able to work.
Increased support of entrepreneurship and startups.

As I already said before, many of you or so on the weekend when we met you and when we were discussing, it's going in your mind that this is something that is interesting for you, but you don't see still enough support from the government site in order to start your own business, your own dreams.
Improve the mentality, overall improved the mentality and overall attitude towards business and entrepreneurship.

Many of you commented that there is so much negative area and let's say to so much negative things going around that many times you even are not sure if you want to start your own business and if you want to start to work in any kind of environment.
Another one was encouraged.
Development of innovation specially in the green area and the last one was spreading of latest technological innovation.
So to end our presentation, I think that today we are here surrounded with young brilliant minds.
